summary: This scripts computes Some Shapley values for Gmes with Externalities
name: Shapley-Values
description:
The script provides tools to compute:
Shapley Value (also using Ieong-Shoham rules) of a Normal form game,
McQuillin-Shapley value
Pham-Do-Norde-Shapley value 
Meyrson-Shapley values                (all three for games in partition form, i.e. with externalities)
install_details: Just open the script, and source it. It is self documented.
